title: VectorShift (YC S23)
description: Worked on Chatbots that Vectorshift provides to subscribed customers.

title: GlamPlus
description: I led website optimization by implementing advanced SEO strategies with an SEO consultant, improving search rankings and creating a FAQ section for customer queries. I developed a React Native marketplace app for bulk salon product purchases, including account management, order tracking, and a dynamic social media footer. Additionally, I implemented access control to secure sensitive components and designed an inventory management system to track product movements and transaction history.
